attributes.action: Request UK citizens turn down their thermostats by 2C to pressure Russia
attributes.additional_details:
To support Ukraine and undermine the Russian war effort by cutting off an important source of foreign currency still being sent to Russia.

A small reduction in temperature settings in homes across the whole nation will mount up to big saving and everyone will feel that they are making a worthwhile contribution to a national effort.

A successful campaign will encourage other, even more exposed, European nations to follow the UK example. 

Any energy surplus could be exported to help allies.
attributes.background: Fund a public information campaign to drive a national effort to reduce energy consumption in the homes.  The aim being to immediately reduce the need to purchase Russian gas and so cut off funding to the Russian state / war machine in Ukraine.

rejection.details:
Decisions relating to how people heat their homes are personal matters for them, not the UK Government or Parliament. 

You might like to sign these petitions which call for related actions:

Place the strictest possible sanctions on Russia until it withdraws from Ukraine: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/609428
 
Seize assets held by anyone with close ties to the Russian government: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/609418 

Full embargo of Russian imports in lieu of active military support in Ukraine: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/609457

Ban all UK trade with Russia and Belarus until Russian troops leave Ukraine: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/609639
